title: Chasing the White Rabbit
description: I’m savage, suave and calculating, And so is the organization I work for. Poor Alice doesn’t stand a chance. Since she tumbled into our dark world, I’ll take her, play with her—devour her. But once she’s had a taste of my madness, Will there be any coming back?From USA Today bestselling author, Felicity Brandon, comes a dark mafia romance series. Hold tight, and let this fast-paced, stand alone novella leave you breathless.
author: Felicity Brandon
